detaileddescription.para: Initializes internal subsystems, assigns device name and optional header, and installs optional external callbacks.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to external callback structure (can be NULL).

briefdescription.para: Attempt to authenticate a user with given login credentials.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the current user context on success, or leaves it unchanged on failure.

briefdescription.para: Check if a user is currently authenticated.

simplesect.para: WSH_SHELL_TRUE if a user is authenticated, WSH_SHELL_FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Resets the user context and optionally triggers the DeAuth callback.

briefdescription.para: Process a new character entered by the user.

detaileddescription.para: Handles interactive editing, history navigation, or command execution if input is complete.
